Package Onlinehandel.entities

Class RegionalOrder

Object
Onlinehandel.entities.Order
Onlinehandel.entities.RegionalOrder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Order>
public class RegionalOrder
extends Order
A regional order within the Onlinehandel.

For regional orders an express option can be set.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private boolean express
    Flag value for express option.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    RegionalOrder​(long id, Costumer c, Iterable<Item> items)
    Constructs a regional order with specified id, costumer and at least one item.
    The id must be greater than 0 and the reference type arguments must be non-null.
    When invalid arguments are passed an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
    Calls the super constructor.
    RegionalOrder​(long id, Costumer c, Iterable<Item> items, boolean express)
    Constructs a regional order with specified id, costumer and at least one item.
    The id must be greater than 0 and the reference type arguments must be non-null.
    When invalid arguments are passed an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    int getTotal()
    Calculates the total amount (of money) to be collected at the drop off location in Euro cents.
    The price is the sum of the items value.

    Methods inherited from class Onlinehandel.entities.Order

    addItems, addItems, collect, compareTo, deliver, getCostumer, getItems, isCollected, isDelivered, toString

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • express

      private boolean express
      Flag value for express option. Defaults to false (no express).

  • Constructor Details

    • RegionalOrder

      public RegionalOrder​(long id, Costumer c, Iterable<Item> items)
      Constructs a regional order with specified id, costumer and at least one item.
      The id must be greater than 0 and the reference type arguments must be non-null.
      When invalid arguments are passed an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Calls the super constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - the id to set
      c - the customer to set
      items - the items to add to this order
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when invalid arguments are passed

    • RegionalOrder

      public RegionalOrder​(long id, Costumer c, Iterable<Item> items, boolean express)
      Constructs a regional order with specified id, costumer and at least one item.
      The id must be greater than 0 and the reference type arguments must be non-null.
      When invalid arguments are passed an IllegalArgumentException is thrown. An invalid custom factor is ignored and instead set to 1.
      Calls the super constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - the id to set
      c - the customer to set
      items - the items to add to this order
      express - flag if this is an express delivery
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when invalid arguments are passed
      See Also:
      Order.getTotal()

  • Method Details

    • getTotal

      public int getTotal()
      Calculates the total amount (of money) to be collected at the drop off location in Euro cents.
      The price is the sum of the items value. Express option has a 20% additional charge. Premium costumers do not pay an express option.
      Specified by:
      getTotal in class Order
      Returns:
      the total amount of money to be collected at the drop off location in Euro cents.
      See Also:
      Order.getTotal()
